page.title: 06HOUSING & HOME LIFE
page.content:
WALKER COTTAGES (Government Owned)
The favourite food was{STEAK {PIE.}There were{NO PETS}in the cottages.{NO-ONE owned a{TELEPHONE}.The average amount of persons per house was{ONE.NO-ONE owned a{CAR.
THE FLEURS (Privately Owned)
The favourite food was{ITALIAN}i.e. pasta.The average number of telephones was{TWO.}The average digit of persons per house was{TWO.
HORSE MARKET (Private Housing)
Most houses had{THREE}occupants but only{ONE}telephone.{TWO}was the average number of pets per house.
